snippet: A juror in the trial of Sulaiman Abu Ghaith, a son-in-law of Osama bin Laden, has notified the court that she has been laid off from her job because of her service on the jury.
abstract: Juror in Manhattan terrorism trial of Sulaiman Abu Ghaith, a son-in-law of Osama bin Laden, notifies Federal District Court in Manhattan that she has been laid off from her job because of her service on the jury; Judge Lewis A Kaplan tells juror that she will be provided with a lawyer at no cost to deal with the 'outrageous' problem on her behalf.
lead_paragraph: A juror in the trial of Sulaiman Abu Ghaith, a son-in-law of Osama bin Laden, has notified the court that she has been laid off from her job because of her service on the jury.

headline.main: Juror Loses Job for Serving in Terror Trial
headline.print_headline: Juror Loses Job for Serving in Terror Trial
